entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow ending this evening then cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind becoming north 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 14.
